name: Crystal Melody
description:
I Will Get My Kingdom Back
Why Why Did The Twins 
Lose Themselves To Darkness

Rainbow Sunshine

I Swear I Will Get You Back To Normal

Despite Everything 

I Will Always

Love You

This Is A Fantasy Story RPG Game Which Will Take You On A Journey To Take Back The Kingdom:

The Game Follows A Rough Story Where You'll Go On An Adventure To Take Back Your Kingdom  And Try To Purify Rainbow And Sunshine Back To Normal

You Will Travel Across The Region Of Avalore You May Laugh You May Cry You May Go Through Hardships Along The Way But You Will Always Find Your Way Back Home
